name: 99 Fails Lite
description:
Addictively easy to play, hard to master!



Dash across pillars through Zeebo's weird dream and get a taste of the weirdness that haunts him!

FEATURES

  • Anyone can play it, no one can master it.
  • Regular 99 mode and diabolical 666 mode for the delusional daredevils.
  • A bunch of surreal entities and events to ruin your mojo.
  • 9 Difficulties.
  • Lots of fails. More than 99, surely.

WHY YOU SHOULD GET THIS GAME

  • You're a glutton for punishment.
  • You're a fan of weird stuff.
  • You consider yourself a skilled gamer.
  • You consider yourself a zero skill gamer.
  • It's cheaper than a Big Mac and it tastes better too.
